name: Migrate yaml
tagline: Migrate data provided by YAML files
body:
### Migrate yaml for Drupal(tm)
This tiny little module allows you to import taxonomy terms and menu links using [YAML](http://yaml.org/) markup as source.

To use the module checkout the code from github:

```
$ git clone https://github.com/stborchert/migrate_yaml.git
$ cd migrate_yaml
```

For a simple example on how to use the migration classes I've added the module _migrate_yaml_test_.

### Authors
_Migrate YAML_ has been created by @stborchert and is sponsored by [undpaul](http://undpaul.de).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
